<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	6.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	The parties hereby confirm that as of the date of this Amendment, there have been no Tenant Delays, Landlord Delays or Uncontrollable Delays except as addressed in this Amendment, and neither party will claim any Tenant Delays, Landlord Delays or Uncontrollable Delays relating to or arising from any act, omission or circumstance which occurred prior to the date of this Amendment for any purpose relating to the Lease, as amended. Notwithstanding the foregoing, neither party is waiving its rights with respect to acts, omissions or circumstances that may occur in the future, and either party will be entitled to claim that a Tenant Delay, Landlord Delay or Uncontrollable Delay, as applicable, has occurred with respect to acts, omissions or circumstances arising after the date of this Amendment.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	7.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	TCEN Change Orders
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Over the course of construction of the Project and Base Building Work for the Premises, various Change Orders have been issued or proposed and the parties wish to document their agreement as to which Change Orders will be implemented, and agree on an allocation of the cost of those Change Orders which the parties have agreed to implement. The Change Orders are listed in the Cumming TCEN Log dated as of July 15, 2016 (the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Cumming TCEN Log
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;), and all reference numbers in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibit B
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibit C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;attached hereto refer to the Cumming TCEN Log numbers and incorporate by reference herein all of the supporting documentation which accompanies such TCEN Change Orders, which supporting documentation has previously been provided to Tenant.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	7.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	The Change Orders which have been or will be implemented are listed on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibit B
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;attached hereto (the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	TCEN Change Orders
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;), and Tenant hereby approves of all of the TCEN Change Orders listed on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibit B
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Those Change Orders listed on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibit C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;attached hereto are not part of the Project and Base Building Work and are not being implemented at this time. Should Tenant make any further changes to the TCEN Change Orders or wish to implement any additional Change Orders, including the Change Orders listed on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibit C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	, such additional scope of work or additional Change Orders will be subject to the terms and conditions of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 4.4(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;of the Original Lease and Landlord will have no obligation to pay any portion of the cost thereof. All future Change Orders relating to the Project and Base Building Work will be governed by the terms of the Original Lease, including
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 4.4(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:2PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:144PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:2PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:144PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	The total anticipated cost of the TCEN Change Orders listed on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibit B
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;is Ten Million Six Hundred Fifty Thousand and 00/100 Dollars ($10,650,000) (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	TCEN Estimate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;), which TCEN Estimate includes Forty Thousand Three Hundred Sixty-Nine Dollars ($40,369) incurred in the assessment of the feasibility of implementing Change Order 33, which TCEN Change Order 33 is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	not
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;being implemented but the foregoing costs will be included in the total cost of the TCEN Change Orders. Tenant will be obligated to contribute Four Million and 00/100 Dollars ($4,000,000) toward the cost of the TCEN Change Orders. Tenant has previously paid Five Hundred Fifty-Six Thousand Two Hundred Forty and 00/100 Dollars ($556,240) toward Tenant&#8217;s contribution to the TCEN Change Orders and will submit the remaining Three Million Four Hundred Forty-Three Thousand Seven Hundred Sixty and 00/100 Dollars ($3,443,760) owed by Tenant within thirty (30) days after the date of full execution of this Amendment. Landlord will contribute the balance of the cost to implement the TCEN Change Orders based upon the final, actual cost to implement such TCEN Change Orders (which may be higher than the TCEN Estimate). Landlord and Tenant will use commercially reasonable efforts to minimize the actual cost of the TCEN Change Orders, with the goal to cause the actual cost not to exceed the TCEN Estimate. Landlord will be responsible for the implementation of the TCEN Change Orders in accordance with the scope set forth in the supporting documentation in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibit B
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;and the back-up documentation referenced in the last sentence of Section 7 above.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:2PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:144PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	In the event that upon completion of the TCEN Change Orders, the final, actual aggregate cost to implement all of the TCEN Change Orders is less than the TCEN Estimate, any cost savings (i.e., the positive difference between the final, actual aggregate cost to implement all of the TCEN Change Orders and the TCEN Estimate) will be divided equally between Landlord and Tenant. For clarity, any such cost savings will be calculated based on the aggregate cost of all TCEN Change Orders (which shall include the Forty Thousand Three Hundred Sixty-Nine Dollars ($40,369) incurred in the assessment of the feasibility of implementing Change Order 33) and will not apply to savings on individual TCEN Change Orders (regardless of any dollar figures set forth in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibit B
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	). Any credit payable to Tenant due to such cost savings will be applied as an additional TI Allowance subject to all terms and conditions of the Lease applicable to the TI Allowance.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	7.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	The following changes are hereby made to the Original Lease to reflect that there will not be any rent abatement as to Building B:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:2PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:144PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:2PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:144PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 2.3(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;of the Original Lease (Base Rent) is hereby amended to delete the words &#8220;and subject to the Building B Base Rent Abatement (as defined in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 5.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;below).&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:2PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:144PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	The first sentence of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 5.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;of the Original Lease is hereby amended and restated to read as follows &#8220;Tenant shall pay to Landlord as Base Rent for (a) Building A and Building D, commencing on the Phase 1 Rent Commencement Date, and (b) Building B, commencing on the Phase 2 Rent Commencement Date (as applicable, the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Rent Commencement Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;), the Base Rent set forth in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 2.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	, subject to the rental adjustments provided in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Article 6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;hereof.&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:2PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:144PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:2PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:144PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 5.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;of the Original Lease is hereby deleted in its entirety.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:2PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:144PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:2PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:144PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	The parenthetical at the end of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;of the Original Lease which states &#8220;(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	provided
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	, however, that, for purposes of calculating the Property Management Fee for months one (1) through twelve (12) of the initial Term with respect to Building B, the dollar amount of Base Rent actually abated in connection with the Building B Base Rent Abatement pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 5.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;of this Lease shall be deducted from Base Rent for Building B)&#8221; is hereby deleted in its entirety.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	7.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	The budget for the Project and Base Building Work has been adjusted as construction of the Premises has progressed, and is higher than the original Project Cost Estimate provided in connection with the Original Lease. In connection with such increase, the following changes are made to the Original Lease:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:2PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:144PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:2PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:144PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 4.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;of the Original Lease is amended and restated in its entirety as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	4.5&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Budget
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Landlord has established a budget for the Total Project Costs (as defined in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibit E
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	) which it believes will be reasonably required to complete construction of the Project and Base Building Work for the Premises, which budget is $173,421,151 (the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Project Cost Estimate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;) as more particularly set forth on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibit D
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;attached hereto, and which Project Cost Estimate does not include the cost to construct PS1. Promptly upon completion of the Project and Base Building Work (except PS1, which shall be excluded from Project Costs for purposes of this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 4.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	), Landlord will calculate the actual total of all Project Costs incurred plus the Land Value Contribution to obtain the actual Total Project Costs (the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Final Budget
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;), which Final Budget will be delivered to Tenant for informational purposes only. In the event the Final Budget is less than $163,881,400 (the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Original Project Cost Estimate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;), the difference shall be an addition to the TI Allowance payable to Tenant pursuant to the Work Letter (the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Additional TI Allowance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:2PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:144PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:2PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:144PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibit D
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;to the Original Lease is hereby amended and replaced in its entirety with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibit D
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;attached hereto.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibit E
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;to the Original Lease is amended to restate the parenthetical in subsection (ix) to read &#8220;(but excluding the cost of tenant improvements in excess of the Base TI Allowance (i.e., costs paid by Tenant toward the tenant improvements will not be included in Project Costs)).&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:2PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:144PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:2PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:144PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	For clarity, notwithstanding that the Project Cost Estimate has been updated as provided herein, for purposes of calculating whether there is any &#8220;Additional TI Allowance&#8221; for purposes of the Original Lease, the Original Project Cost Estimate of $163,881,400 will be used. The updated Project Cost Estimate attached to this Amendment is being provided for informational purposes only, and Tenant will not receive any credit for any cost savings between the Original Project Cost Estimate and the updated Project Cost Estimate attached to this Amendment as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibit D
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	8.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Subordination and Lender Consent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Tenant agrees that the form of subordination, non-disturbance and attornment agreement (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	SNDA
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221;) attached to this Amendment as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibit E
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;satisfies the requirements pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 27.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;of the Existing Lease with respect to a commercially reasonable SNDA. To the extent any lender consent is required as a condition to Landlord&#8217;s entry into this Amendment, Landlord hereby represents that such consent has been obtained, and Landlord hereby agrees to indemnify, defend and hold harmless Tenant for, from and against any Claims incurred by Tenant to the extent arising from Landlord&#8217;s breach of the foregoing representation.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	9.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Ratification of Completion Guaranty
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Tenant hereby ratifies and confirms the completion guaranty provided by Tenant to Landlord pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 46
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;of the Existing Lease. Tenant acknowledges and agrees that the Guaranteed Obligations shall not be excused, reduced, modified, discharged or released due to the execution of this Amendment, and the execution and delivery of this Amendment shall not constitute any defense against Tenant&#8217;s obligation to perform or satisfy the Guaranteed Obligations.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	10.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Broker
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Tenant represents and warrants that it has not dealt with any broker or agent other than Cushman &amp; Wakefield of San Diego, Inc. in the negotiation for or the obtaining of this Amendment ("
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Broker
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	"), and agrees to reimburse, indemnify, save, defend (at Landlord's option and with counsel reasonably acceptable to Landlord, at Tenant's sole cost and expense) and hold harmless the Landlord Indemnitees for, from and against any and all cost or liability for compensation claimed by any such broker or agent employed or engaged by it or claiming to have been employed or engaged by it. No commission will be payable to the Broker on account of this Amendment.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	11.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	No Default
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Tenant represents, warrants and covenants that, to the best of Tenant's knowledge, Landlord and Tenant are not in default of any of their respective obligations under the Existing Lease and no event has occurred that, with the passage of time or the giving of notice (or both) would constitute a default by either Landlord or Tenant thereunder. Landlord represents, warrants and covenants that, to the best of Landlord's knowledge, Landlord and Tenant are not in default of any of their respective obligations under the Existing Lease and no event has occurred that, with the passage of time or the giving of notice (or both) would constitute a default by either Landlord or Tenant thereunder.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	12.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Effect of Amendment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Except as modified by this Amendment, the Existing Lease and all the covenants, agreements, terms, provisions and conditions thereof shall remain in full force and effect and are hereby ratified and affirmed. In the event of any conflict between the terms contained in this Amendment and the Existing Lease, the terms herein contained shall supersede and control the obligations and liabilities of the parties.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	13.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Successors and Assigns
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Each of the covenants, conditions and agreements contained in this Amendment shall inure to the benefit of and shall apply to and be binding upon the parties hereto and their respective heirs, legatees, devisees, executors, administrators and permitted successors and assigns and sublessees. Nothing in this section shall in any way alter the provisions of the Lease restricting assignment or subletting.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	14.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Miscellaneous
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. This Amendment becomes effective only upon execution and delivery hereof by Landlord and Tenant. The captions of the paragraphs and subparagraphs in this Amendment are inserted and included solely for convenience and shall not be considered or given any effect in construing the provisions hereof. All exhibits hereto are incorporated herein by reference. Submission of this instrument for examination or signature by Tenant does not constitute a reservation of or option for a lease, and shall not be effective as a lease, lease amendment or otherwise until execution by and delivery to both Landlord and Tenant.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	15.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Authority
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Tenant guarantees, warrants and represents that the individual or individuals signing this Amendment on behalf of Tenant have the power, authority and legal capacity to sign this Amendment on behalf of and to bind all entities, corporations, partnerships, limited liability companies, joint venturers or other organizations and entities on whose behalf such individual or individuals have signed. Landlord guarantees, warrants and represents that the individual or individuals signing this Amendment on behalf of Landlord have the power, authority and legal capacity to sign this Amendment on behalf of and to bind all entities, corporations, partnerships, limited liability companies, joint venturers or other organizations and entities on whose behalf such individual or individuals have signed.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	16.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Counterparts; Facsimile and PDF Signatures
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. This Amendment may be executed in one or more counterparts, each of which, when taken together, shall constitute one and the same document. A facsimile or portable document format (PDF)&#160;signature on this Amendment shall be equivalent to, and have the same force and effect as, an original signature.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">

</TR>

<DIV>
<A NAME="EX1030DEEDOFVARIATIONGRANT_HTM_SA63A961B677F4C2411FB257000619973">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	THIS DEED
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;is made the 24th&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;day of October&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;2016
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	BETWEEN:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	GRANTA PARK JCO 1 LIMITED
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;incorporated in Jersey with registration number 110676 of Ogier House, The Esplanade, St Heiier, Jersey JE4 9WG (the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Landlord
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;);
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	BIOMED REALTY, L.P.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;incorporated under the laws of the State of Maryland, United States of America with registered number M07931959 whose registered office is at c/o The Corporation Trust Incorporated, 351 West Camden Street, Baltimore, Maryland 21201, United States of America (the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Landlord&#8217;s Guarantor
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;);
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ILLUMINA CAMBRIDGE LIMITED
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;Company registration number 03625145 whose registered office is at Chesterford Research Park, Little Chesterford, Saffron Walden, Essex CB10 1XL (the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Tenant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;); and
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ILLUMINA, INC
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. incorporated under the laws of the State of Delaware, United States of America with registered number 3228889 whose registered office is c/o The Corporation Trust Company, Corporation Trust Centre, 1209 Orange Street, Wilmington, New Castle, Delaware 19801, United States of America (the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Guarantor
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	BACKGROUND:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	The Landlord, Landlord&#8217;s Guarantor, Tenant and the Guarantor entered into an agreement for lease dated 25 June 2015 (the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Agreement for Lease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	The Parties have agreed that this Deed is both supplemental to the terms of the Agreement for Lease and will vary the terms of the same as set out in this Deed. All other terms and conditions of the Agreement for Lease shall remain in full force and effect.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Words and phrases in this Deed shall have the same meaning as ascribed to them in the Agreement for Lease. The annexures attached hereto form part of and are incorporated into this Deed. In case of any ambiguity or conflict between the provisions of the Agreement for Lease and this Deed, the provisions of this Deed shall prevail.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	THE PARTIES HEREBY AGREE:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	The parties have agreed that:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	irrespective of its date, this Deed shall be in full force and effect on and from the date of this Deed (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Effective Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	the terms and conditions of the Agreement for Lease shall be deemed to be amended by this Deed (being the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Deed of Variation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; for the purposes of the Agreement for Lease) as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	to incorporate the amendments to the Agreement for Lease shown as struck through or underlined in the Agreement for Lease annexed at Annexure&#160;1 hereto and that the Agreement for Lease shall be read and construed as if such amendments had been incorporated since the Effective Date;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	the documents at Annexure&#160;2, Annexure&#160;3, Annexure&#160;4 and Annexure&#160;8 shall be deemed to be annexed to the Agreement for Lease;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage94"></A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	the Construction Programme current at the Effective Date is that at Annexure&#160;5;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	the Landlord&#8217;s Ledger current at the Effective Date is that at Annexure&#160;6;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	the Development Ledger current at the Effective Date is that at Annexure&#160;7.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Notwithstanding that the relevant provisions of the Agreement for Lease have not been amended pursuant to clause&#160;2 above, the Parties acknowledge and agree that:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	the Planning Phase 1 Consent and the Planning Phase 2 Consent were both achieved before the Planning Long Stop Date;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	the Unconditional Date has occurred as the Condition Precedent has been satisfied and the Superior Lease has been granted; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	the Planning Amenity Building Consent was obtained by the Landlord on 4 February 2016 and therefore the Rent Reduction as defined in Schedule 1 paragraph 20.1 of the Agreement for Lease shall start to accrue in respect of any failure of the Landlord to provide the Amenity Building by 5 November 2018.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	All claims and potential claims of the Landlord (whether or not made by the Landlord) for Extensions of Time under the Agreement for Lease occurring prior to and including the Effective Date are settled with full, final and binding effect and are included within and form part of the new Works Target Date and new Works Long Stop Date as set out in Annexure&#160;1.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	A person who is not a party to this Deed has no right under the Contracts (Rights of Third Parties) Act 1999 to enforce any term of this Deed but this does not affect any right or remedy of a third party which exists or is available apart from that Act.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Clause&#160;23 of the Agreement for Lease shall apply to any dispute or difference arising under or in connection with this Deed.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	This Deed is governed by and shall be construed in accordance with the laws of England and the parties submit to the jurisdiction of the English courts.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Executed as a deed and delivered on the date specified at the beginning of this document.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;PADDING-TOP:10PX;">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;WIDTH:100%;BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	EXECUTED as a DEED by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	GRANTA PARK JCO 1 LIMITED
</FONT>

	&#160;a company incorporated in Jersey by BMR LLC as sole shareholder, being a person who in accordance with the laws of that territory is acting under the authority of the company:
</FONT>
</DIV>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Article III.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:14PT;COLOR:#365F91;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	BACKGROUND:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;PADDING-TOP:1PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	(A)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	The Landlord owns or will own a long leasehold interest in property at the Array, Granta Park, Cambridge and has agreed to grant the Tenant a lease of the Demised Premises on the terms contained in this Agreement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

	(B)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	GPEL has applied for detailed planning permission for the Phase 1 Development and outline planning permission for the Phase 2 Development and subject to obtaining Satisfactory Planning Consents for those works, the Landlord will construct the Building and complete the Works before the grant of the Lease.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;PADDING-TOP:1PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_69"></A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;PADDING-TOP:32PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:8PX;FONT-SIZE:14PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Article IV.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:14PT;COLOR:#365F91;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	AGREEMENT
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;PADDING-TOP:1PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:54PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-LEFT:8PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	1
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:1.3333333333333333PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-INDENT:-1.3333333333333333PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	DEFINITIONS AND INTERPRETATION
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;PADDING-TOP:1PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:143%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	1.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	In this Agreement and the Schedules the following words and expressions shall have the following meanings:
</FONT>
</DIV>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

</DIV>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	the Tenant shall be given a reasonable opportunity to make representations in relation to any other amendments that may be proposed to the schedule of amendments prior to completion of the Building Contract and the Landlord shall have due regard to such representations but shall not be fettered by them (provided always that the Tenant shall not be entitled to comment upon matters relating solely to the Landlord&#8217;s Works);
</FONT>
</DIV>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Specification:
</FONT>

	&#8221; have the meanings given to them in section 1159 and Schedule 6 of the Companies Act 2006) or a company in which a person has a controlling interest where the same person also holds a controlling interest in the Landlord or the Landlord&#8217;s Guarantor and for this purpose a person has a controlling interest if (had that person been a company) the other company and the Landlord would have each been its Subsidiary;

<TD COLSPAN="2" STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

	Subsidiary
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; and &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Holding Company

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; have the meanings given to them in section 1159 and Schedule 6 of the Companies Act 2006) or a company in which a person has a controlling interest where the same person also holds a controlling interest in the Tenant or the Guarantor and for this purpose a person has a controlling interest if (had that person been a company) the other company and the Tenant would have each been its Subsidiary;

	means the pre-construction services agreement

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#B5082D;TEXT-DECORATION:LINE-THROUGH;">
	substantially
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#B5082D;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	in the form annexed at Schedule 10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#B5082D;TEXT-DECORATION:LINE-THROUGH;">
	and the Tenant shall be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#B5082D;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#B5082D;TEXT-DECORATION:LINE-THROUGH;">
	given a reasonable opportunity to make representations in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#B5082D;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#B5082D;TEXT-DECORATION:LINE-THROUGH;">
	relation to any amendments that may be proposed to such
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#B5082D;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#B5082D;TEXT-DECORATION:LINE-THROUGH;">
	agreement prior to its completion and the Landlord shall have
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#B5082D;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#B5082D;TEXT-DECORATION:LINE-THROUGH;">
	due regard to such representations but shall not be fettered by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#B5082D;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#B5082D;TEXT-DECORATION:LINE-THROUGH;">
	them (provided always that the Tenant shall not be entitled to
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#B5082D;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#B5082D;TEXT-DECORATION:LINE-THROUGH;">
	comm ent upon m att ers r elating solely t o the Landlord&#8217;s Works);
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2D96D2;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	in respect of the enabling works and part of the
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2D96D2;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	&#160;Landlord&#8217;s W orks ;

<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:6PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

	Pre-Construction

	Services:

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2D96D2;">
	means the pre-construction services the Contractor is to
</FONT>

	perform under the Building Contract entered into following completion of the Contractor&#8217;s services under the Pre- Construction Services Agreement, such pre-construction services to be performed in respect of the remainder of the Landlord&#8217;s Works and all of the Tenant&#8217;s Works such services to be agreed by the Tenant (acting reasonably);
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>

<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:16PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Prohibited Materials:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:21PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	means materials which:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-TOP:1PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:68PX;TEXT-INDENT:-47PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#B5082D;TEXT-DECORATION:LINE-THROUGH;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	do not accord with any relevant recommendations contained or referred to in the latest version (at the time the Building Contract is or was entered into) of &#8220;Good Practice in the Selection of Construction Materials&#8221; sponsored by the British Property Federation and the British Council for Offices; or
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:68PX;TEXT-INDENT:-47PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#B5082D;TEXT-DECORATION:LINE-THROUGH;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	are not in accordance with British Standards and Codes of Practice, good building practice or having been supplied or placed in the market in breach of the Construction Products Regulations; or
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:68PX;TEXT-INDENT:-47PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#B5082D;TEXT-DECORATION:LINE-THROUGH;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	are generally known within the UK construction industry to be deleterious at the time of specification or selection or use; or
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:68PX;TEXT-INDENT:-47PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#B5082D;TEXT-DECORATION:LINE-THROUGH;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	are generally known within the UK construction industry at the relevant time to be injurious to human health and safety or posing a threat to the structural stability, performance or physical integrity of the Works;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:16PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Project Costs:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:21PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	is defined in Schedule 1 Part 6;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:16PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Rectification Period:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:21PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	means the period of 12 months following the Certificate Date;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:16PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Refusal:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:21PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	means any of the following:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-TOP:1PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#B5082D;TEXT-DECORATION:LINE-THROUGH;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	a refusal by the Determining Authority to grant planning permission pursuant to any Planning Application;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#B5082D;TEXT-DECORATION:LINE-THROUGH;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	a refusal by or on behalf of the Secretary of State to grant planning permission following a Planning Appeal;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#B5082D;TEXT-DECORATION:LINE-THROUGH;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	a refusal by the Determining Authority to vary or remove an Unacceptable Condition pursuant to an application under section 73 or 96A of the Planning Act;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#B5082D;TEXT-DECORATION:LINE-THROUGH;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	a failure by the Determining Authority to determine the Planning Application within the period required under section 78(2) of the Planning Act or any extended period agreed by the Landlord;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	(e)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#B5082D;TEXT-DECORATION:LINE-THROUGH;">
	(e)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	the grant of a Planning Consent which has been agreed or determined pursuant to this Agreement not to
</FONT>
</DIV>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;WIDTH:95.19650655021834%;BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;">

<TD COLSPAN="2">

<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:25%;">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:75%;">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD COLSPAN="2" STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:204PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	be a Satisfactory Planning Consent;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:16PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Remedial Works:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:12PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	means those works comprising the making good of Snagging Items and Defects in each case which the Contractor is obliged to carry out under the terms of the Building Contract;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:16PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Rent Commencement Date:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:12PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	means:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-TOP:1PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#B5082D;TEXT-DECORATION:LINE-THROUGH;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	the date that is six months after the Term Commencement Date; or
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#B5082D;TEXT-DECORATION:LINE-THROUGH;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	in the event that the Lease is granted pursuant to clause 14 the date that is six months after the Certificate Date;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:12PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	or in both cases such earlier or later date as is ascertained in accordance with sub-clause 13.3.2 and/or paragraph 8.6 of Schedule 1 Part 1;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:16PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Review Period:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:12PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	means seven weeks following the date of issue of a Planning Consent;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:16PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	RICS:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:12PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	means the Royal Institution of Chartered Surveyors;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:16PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Satisfactory Planning Consent:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:5.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:12PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	means the grant of a Planning Consent which (together with any associated Planning Agreement and CIL Requirement) are free from:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

	any Landlord&#8217;s Unacceptable Condition (unless all Landlord&#8217;s Unacceptable Conditions are waived by the Landlord or deemed or determined not to be a Landlord&#8217;s Unacceptable Condition in accordance with this Agreement); and

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

	(ss)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	prevent the provision and use of 600 car parking spaces as part of the Phase 1 Development save where the Landlord agrees to provide the shortfall in a reasonable alternative location (such location to be no further than a 5 minute walk from the Building);
</FONT>
</DIV>

<TD COLSPAN="2" STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-TOP:2PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#B5082D;TEXT-DECORATION:LINE-THROUGH;">
	(aaa)

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	the costs, fees and expenses properly incurred by the Landlord under or connection with the performance of its obligations under paragraph 3.2 of Schedule 1 Part 1 (including the fees of the Consultants and other advisors);
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:145%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	1.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	References to a &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	schedule
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;, &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	annexure
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;, &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	part
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; or &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	clause
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; are references respectively to a schedule or Annexure to or a Part or clause of this Agreement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	1.3

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	References to any statute or statutory section shall include any statutory amendment, modification or re-enactment of it for the time being in force and all subordinate legislation made under it.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:146%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	1.4

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

	parties
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; mean the Landlord and the Tenant only unless the context otherwise requires that expression to include also the Guarantor.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:146%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	1.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	References to &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	working days
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; mean any day from Monday to Friday (inclusive) which is not Christmas Day, Good Friday or a statutory bank holiday.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	1.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Wherever in this Agreement the consent or approval of the Tenant may in specified circumstances be deemed to be granted the relevant consent or approval will not be deemed to have been granted if the Landlord has not provided the Tenant with all information which the Tenant reasonably requests in writing prior to the expiry of the period after which the deeming takes effect and would reasonably and properly be necessary in relation to the relevant consent or approval.
</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;PADDING-TOP:1PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">

	2.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;PADDING-TOP:1PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">

</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	2.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Clauses 10 to 14 (inclusive), clause 17-19 (inclusive) and clauses 21 22 and 35 are conditional on the satisfaction of the Condition Precedent and the grant of the Superior Lease and shall come into force on the Unconditional Date.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:143%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	2.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Save where expressly permitted pursuant to the terms of this Agreement the Landlord and Tenant may only waive the Condition Precedent by agreement in writing.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:145%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	2.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	If on 31 December 2015 the Planning Phase 1 Consent and the Planning Phase 2 Consent have both been granted but either:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">

	the Review Period has not expired in relation to either the Planning Phase 1 Consent or the Planning Phase 2 Consent; or

	3
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:14PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:14PT;COLOR:#365F91;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	OBTAINING SATISFACTORY PLANNING CONSENTS
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;PADDING-TOP:1PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">

</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	3.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	The Landlord shall use reasonable endeavours to procure pursuant to its agreement with GPEL that GPEL obtains all Satisfactory Planning Consents as soon as possible but in any event so as to achieve the Unconditional Date prior to the Planning Longstop Date.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	3.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	The Landlord shall consult with and keep the Tenant regularly informed of the endeavours being made and proposed to achieve satisfaction of the Planning Condition by the Unconditional Date at all material times including (without limitation but in respect of the Phase 1 Development only):
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_94"></A>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	3.2.1
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:1.3333333333333333PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-INDENT:-1.3333333333333333PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	providing to the Tenant (at the Landlord&#8217;s cost) copies (which may be electronic) of all material draft and final documents and reports (including drawings, plans, specifications and design details) and correspondence relating to Planning Applications and Proceedings and draft and final Planning Agreements; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>

	3.2.2

</DIV>

	giving the Tenant where possible at least five working days&#8217; notice of any meetings to be held with any Determining Authority and inviting the Tenant (who may nominate a nominee) to attend and participate in any material meetings with the Determining Authority and shall provide the tenant with a copy of any minutes of any meetings with the Determining Authority.

	4
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:14PT;">
